devdoc.para: Specifies the font size.

Specifies the unit types.
A centimeter.
A unit of font width relative to its parent element's font.
For example, if the font size of a phrase is 2em and it is within a paragraph whose font size is 10px, then the font size of the phrase is 20px.
Refer to the World Wide Web Consortium Website for more information.
A unit of font height relative to its parent element's font.
Refer to the World Wide Web Consortium Website for more information.
